Body:
"""check whether output types are constructed correctly.
    """
with tmpdir.as_cwd():
    output = (
        """All modules will be plotted.
All hosts will be plotted.
A total of 2 runs will be plotted.
Your file was saved as 'test.{}' in the working directory.
"""
        .format(output_type))
    output = (
        """Plotting GPU and CPU data.
Plotting all hosts in input file.
Plotting all modules in your input data.
Your file was saved as 'testfile.{}' in the working directory.
"""
        .format(output_type))
    result = cli_runner.invoke(cli, ['plot', '--csv={}'.format(data[
        'test.csv']), '--output-name=testfile', '--output-format={}'.format
        (output_type)])
    assert result.output == output
    assert result.exit_code == 0
pytest.mark.parametrize('output_type', ('png', 'pdf'))
